Title: Relates to a report on the distribution of state highway funding by region
Summary: Directs the department of transportation to issue a report on the distribution of state highway funding by region and to develop a formula for future distribution; requires the commissioner of transportation shall cause to be performed an evaluation of the preventative maintenance of state highways and bridges in each department of transportation region; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the department of transportation to issue a report on the distribution of state highway funding by region and to develop a formula for future distribution
